analyzed: mahāpratisarā stotram
om namaḥ śrī mahāpratisarāyai

original: yasyāḥ smaraṇamātreṇa sarve pāpāḥ kṣayaṃ gatāḥ |
analyzed: yasyāḥ smaraṇa mātreṇa sarve pāpāḥ kṣayam gatāḥ

original: yayā yukto vajrakāyo namastasyai namo namaḥ || 1 ||
analyzed: yayā yuktaḥ vajra kāyaḥ namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ

original: yāṃ smaran rākṣasaḥ krūro māṭharaṃ kukṣisaṃsthitam |
analyzed: yām smaran rākṣasaḥ krūraḥ māṭharam kukṣi saṃsthitam

original: prākṣipad goviṣaṃ nadyāṃ namastasyai namo namaḥ || 2 ||
analyzed: prākṣipat go viṣam nadyām namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
yā arakṣat vaṇijaḥ putram krūra sarpāt vadha udyatāt
viṣa dāha mumūrṣum ca namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
brahmadattaḥ mahā rājaḥ yayā rakṣita mastakaḥ
ripum jitvā virājaḥ ubhūt namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
bhikṣuḥ duḥśīlakaḥ rogī yayā kaṇṭhe prabandhitaḥ

original: prāṇānmuktvā yayau svargaṃ namastasyai namo namaḥ || 5 ||
analyzed: prāṇān muktvā yayau svargam namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
samudre pota saṃkṣubdhe vaṇijām prāṇa rakṣakaḥ
yām smaran sārthavāhaḥ bhūt namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
yasyām ca pratibaddhāyām bhāryāyām sutam āptavān
prasārita bhujaḥ rājā namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ

original: daridro yāṃ prati smṛtvā dīnārān pradadau jine |
analyzed: daridraḥ yām prati smṛtvā dīnārān pradadau jine
rāja abhīṣṭa pradātā abhūt namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
yām prabaddhvā asuraiḥ yuddham śakraḥ cūḍāmaṇau prabhuḥ

original: labdhavān vijayaṃ vajrī namastasyai namo namaḥ || 9 ||
analyzed: labdhavān vijayam vajrī namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
yasyāḥ mantra balena eva pūrya pāramitāḥ ca ṣaḍ
mārāḥ jitāḥ jinaiḥ buddhaiḥ namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
apadhīraḥ vadha arhaḥ api prakṣiptaḥ sarva saṅkaṭe
yām smṛtvā parimuktaḥ abhūt namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
yayā bandhita kaṇṭhaḥ ca muktaḥ bhūt pāpa saṅkaṭāt
nagare nāyakaḥ bhūt ca namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
yā ca aparājitā vidyā sarva buddhaiḥ ca dhāritā
mudritā bhāṣitā nityam paṭhitā parideśitā
likhitā moditā sattva hitāya pūjitā sadā

original: smṛtā kāyagatā kṛtvā namastasyai namo namaḥ || 14 ||
analyzed: smṛtā kāya gatā kṛtvā namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
yasyāḥ smaraṇa mātrāt na durlabham bhuvanatraye
pāṭha svādhyāyanāt vā api namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
yā vidyā durlabhā buddhaiḥ vyākṛtā supta śaṃsitā
mahatī dhāraṇī khyātā sarva pāpa kṣayaṅkarī
mahā balā mahā vīryā mahā tejāḥ mahat prabhā
mahā guṇavatī vidyā sarva bhāra vidāraṇī
jananī bodhisattvānām sarva duṣṭa vināśinī
mahā dhyāna ratānām ca gṛhṇatām likhatām sadā
pāṭha adhyayana kṛtām nityam dadhatām śṛṇvatām tathā

original: parebhyo deśitā caiva nityaṃ manasi bhāvitā |
analyzed: parebhyaḥ deśitā ca eva nityam manasi bhāvitā
sā pustaka gatām kṛtvā pūjyamānā namaskṛtā
sarva pāpa harī bhadrā bodhi saṃbhāra pūriṇī
namaḥ tasyai namaḥ tasyai namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
yasyāḥ mantra prabhāveṇa sarva bhayāni upadravāḥ
duṣṭāḥ sura manuṣyāḥ ca daitya gandharva rākṣasāḥ
grahāḥ skandāḥ apasmārāḥ piśācāḥ yakṣa kinnarāḥ
ḍākinyaḥ śākinī saṃghāḥ nāgā kārkhoda vyādhayaḥ
jvarāḥ ca vividhāḥ rogāḥ para karma kṛtāḥ tathā
viṣa agni śastra mantrāṇi vidyutaḥ kāla vāyavaḥ
ati vṛṣṭiḥ anāvṛṣṭiḥ sarva śatru bhayāni ca

original: tathānye pāpasargā vā vinaśyanti na saṃśayaḥ || 26 ||
analyzed: tathā anye pāpa sargāḥ vā vinaśyanti na saṃśayaḥ
sarva kāryāṇi namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ

original: yaścaitāṃ dhārayedvidyāṃ kaṇṭhe bāhau ca mastake || 27 ||
analyzed: yaḥ ca etām dhārayet vidyām kaṇṭhe bāhau ca mastake

original: nityaṃ rakṣanti devāstaṃ daityā nāgāśca mānuṣāḥ |
analyzed: nityam rakṣanti devāḥ tam daityāḥ nāgāḥ ca mānuṣāḥ
gandharvāḥ kinnarāḥ yakṣāḥ bhūta preta piśācakāḥ
ḍākinyaḥ rākṣasāḥ dūtyaḥ kūṣmāṇḍāḥ kaṭhapūtanāḥ

original: trisandhyaṃ yaḥ paṭhennityaṃ buddhā rakṣanti taṃ sadā || 29 ||
analyzed: trisandhyam yaḥ paṭhet nityam buddhāḥ rakṣanti tam sadā
pratyekāḥ śrāvakāḥ ca eva bodhisattvāḥ mahardhikāḥ
yoginaḥ siddha mantrāḥ ca mahā vīryāḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ
vajrapāṇiḥ ca yakṣa indraḥ śakraḥ ca tridaśaiḥ saha
catvāraḥ ca mahā rājāḥ brahma viṣṇu maheśvarāḥ
bhairavāḥ mātṛkāḥ durgāḥ tathā anye māra kāyikāḥ
vidyā devyaḥ mahā vīryāḥ mahā bala parākramāḥ
tathā dhanyā mahābhāgā padma kuṇḍaliḥ eva ca
hārītī pāñcikāḥ ca eva śaṅkhinī kūṭadantinī
śrīḥ sarasvatī lakṣmīḥ siddheśvarī sadānugā

original: tamevā'nye'pi rakṣanti yasya vidyā kare sthitā || 38 ||
analyzed: tam eva anye api rakṣanti yasya vidyā kare sthitā

original: sa bhavet sarvasattvānāṃ mokṣārthaṃ ca samudyataḥ |
analyzed: sa bhavet sarva sattvānām mokṣa artham ca samudyataḥ
namaḥ tasyai namaḥ tasyai namaḥ tasyai namaḥ namaḥ
śrī mahāpratisarā stotram samāptam
